act:
597454 THE INDIAN UNIVERSITIES (REPEAL) BILL, 2001
ACT NO. 36 OF 2001 [ 4th September, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Indian Universities Act, 1904.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1845023 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Indian Universities (Repeal) Act, 2001.
727344 2Repeal of Act 8 of 1904.- The Indian Universities Act, 1904 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
